excerpt.rendered: The biggest culinary celebration in Paris returns! Three days of food, wine, and entertainment.

content.rendered:
Join us for the annual Paris Food Festival, a three-day celebration of gastronomy featuring the best chefs, restaurants, and food artisans from across France and beyond.

Experience cooking demonstrations by Michelin-starred chefs, taste exquisite dishes from over 100 vendors, attend wine and spirits masterclasses, and enjoy live music and entertainment throughout the festival.

Festival Highlights:

  • Live cooking demonstrations by celebrity chefs
  • International food village with 100+ vendors
  • Wine and spirits pavilion
  • Street food market
  • Kids' cooking workshops
  • Live music and entertainment

Schedule:

Friday: 5 PM - 11 PM
Saturday: 12 PM - 11 PM
Sunday: 12 PM - 9 PM

excerpt.rendered: Celebrate the grape harvest season in the heart of Burgundy wine country.

content.rendered:
Experience the magic of the grape harvest season at our annual Burgundy Wine Harvest Celebration. This special event brings together wine lovers, local winemakers, and food enthusiasts for a weekend of celebration.

Participate in traditional grape picking, tour historic wine cellars, enjoy wine tastings from prestigious Burgundy estates, and feast on regional specialties prepared by local chefs.

Event Activities:

  • Guided vineyard tours and grape picking
  • Wine cellar visits and tastings
  • Traditional harvest feast
  • Meet the winemakers sessions
  • Live folk music and dancing
  • Local artisan market

Transportation from Paris available. Accommodation packages can be arranged.

excerpt.rendered: Indulge in the finest chocolates from master chocolatiers across Europe.

content.rendered:
Calling all chocolate enthusiasts! The Chocolate Lovers Fair is back with an even more decadent selection of artisanal chocolates, pralines, and confections.

Meet master chocolatiers, watch live chocolate-making demonstrations, participate in tasting workshops, and discover rare cacao varieties from around the world. This is a paradise for anyone with a sweet tooth!

Fair Features:

  • 50+ artisanal chocolate makers
  • Live chocolate sculpting demonstrations
  • Chocolate and wine pairing workshops
  • Bean-to-bar chocolate making sessions
  • Kids' chocolate workshop
  • Exclusive chocolate collections for purchase

Free entry for children under 12.

excerpt.rendered: A vibrant night market featuring the best street food from around the world.

content.rendered:
Experience a global culinary adventure at our monthly Street Food Night Market! Every last Friday of the month, we transform the riverside into a bustling night market featuring diverse street food from around the world.

From Asian dumplings and tacos to Middle Eastern kebabs and French crepes, there's something to satisfy every craving. Enjoy your food with craft beers, cocktails, and live DJ sets.

What to Expect:

  • 30+ international street food vendors
  • Craft beer and cocktail bars
  • Live music and DJ performances
  • Outdoor seating with river views
  • Family-friendly atmosphere
  • Vegan and vegetarian options available

Free entry. Pay as you eat and drink.
